name: Lego Microgame (SydneyJ619)
description:
Title: Lego Microgame 

Platform: PC Game 

Genre: Platformer 

Rating: E 

Target Market: Ages 6+, casual gamers

 Game Overview: This is a Lego Microgame where you are to explore the island as far as possible and not lose the game by being attached by an enemy or falling off.  

Instructions: You will use the arrow keys, space bar, and the mouse to navigate through the game. 

Game Design Team Your Name – Sydney Johnston
